newsitem.title: USA: Brown & Sharpe files for 4.156 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Brown & Sharpe files for 4.156 mln shares.

text.p: Brown & Sharpe Manufacturing Co filed Friday in a Securities and Exchange Commission filing for up to 4.156 million Class A common shares.
The North Kingston, Rhode Island-based company said that of the total, four million Class A common shares are being offered by the company and 156,000 Class A shares are being sold by stockholders.
The net proceeds from the offering will be used to repay any outstanding debt and for working capital and general corporate purposes.
The company said the offering will be made through Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette Securities and CS First Boston.
The underwriters have been granted an over-allotment option for up to 623,400 Class A common shares.
